summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the General Fund; clarifying uses of the Special Employment Subfund, the Unemployment Insurance Subfund, the Group Term Life Insurance Subfund, the Health Care Subfund, and the Industrial Insurance Subfund of the General Fund; amending Sections 4.40.020 and 4.44.060 of the Seattle Municipal Code, eliminating the two Accounts within the Emergency Subfund of the General Fund; and repealing Ordinance 117320.
